LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.label: Dehydration recovery
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.description: Debilitated by excessive dehydration, the body recovers almost immediately, but it takes two days to fully recover.
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.0.label: convalescence
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.LingHaveWaterPawn.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.label: Dehydration
LanguageData.LingNoWaterPawnLoseWater.description: Extreme dehydration, but not fatal, turns organisms into a mass of organic matter that can return to its original form after hydration.
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_Abuse.label: TODO
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_ArsenicBuildup.label: Arsenic poisoning
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_ArsenicBuildup.description: The pawn is probably dying soon
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_BeautyPill.label: Exceptional beauty
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_BeautyPill.description: This creature has become very attractive due to the effects of drugs
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_BreakFellingPill.label: Affective disturbance
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_BreakFellingPill.descripti: This creature is very fascinating because of the drug.
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_Indulgences.label: Holy water
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_Indulgences.description: The death of this creature will not bring joy or sorrow to others.
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_LeaveGrain.label: Inedia
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_LeaveGrain.description: This creature takes in an unimaginable amount of energy in a short period of time, so that it has a certain effect on its actions.
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_Ordinary.label: Psychically deaf
LanguageData.ZeroTech_Drug_Ordinary.description: The biological psychically deaf from the drug.
